Claudus beaten

This character is the healer in the fight club area.
She is a female human named Kellisai
She remains where she is until Claudus is beaten
She has separate dialogue for what medal the player currently has in his possession, always checking for the highest level medal.

When Claudus is beaten, she should leave the area, saying this first starting condition as she goes, and if selected.

I copied the arena stuff from John's arena test, so it should all work just like it. Talk to him to see about proper scripting.
